import React from 'react' import {Navbar ,Nav,Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {logout} from '../actions/userAction' const Header = () => { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const {userInfo} = userLogin const dispacth = useDispatch(); const logoutHandler = () => { dispacth(logout()) } return ( <> Shoppzy
CART {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ): ( SIGN IN)}
) } export default Header
